title: # 28 – Something’s Burning Uncut – Colin Quinn & Nick Di Paolo
description:
Something’s Burning Uncut is the uncut audio from my cooking show “Something’s Burning” on YouTube. On this episode that originally aired on YouTube Sep 2, 2019, Colin and Nick reminisce about the Tough Crowd days while I attempt to make chicken parmesan sandwiches.

Get the Recipe! http://bit.ly/BurningChickenParmRecipe 

My stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
